name: Juggernaut (itch)
description:
You play as juggernaut, a DOTA 2 hero, simply farming gold until your inevitable demise. If that annoying tinker and his rockets weren't so annoying, you would probably be farming a bit faster. 

Farm as much gold in 60 seconds as you can, dodge rockets and enemies.

Choosing fullscreen mode makes the life icons and drawn text look unproportional.

Game was inspired by DOTA 2, by Valve Software.
